Portfolio

About

Hello! My name is Rachel and I'm currently a 3rd year studying Media Studies and Computer Science at UC Berkeley. I aspire to become a web developer, product designer, or product manager in the fields that will intersect my interests and passions for media, technology, and fashion.

If you're interested in working with me on web and graphic design projects, connect with me using the form below. I look forward to hearing from you!

Modern Citizen Blog

I coded Modern Citizen's blog layout. Modern Citizen is the online style destination for the modern woman.

  • HTML, CSS
  • June 2014
  • Modern Citizen
  • Web Development

Wed Design

Wed Design is a startup idea for my final project for the Web Design Decal. The concept is that couples can use this site to help plan their big day. It is purely a mockup and not a web application (though I would like to develop one in the future!).

  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery
  • May 2014
  • Web Design Decal
  • Web Design

Reddit Redesign

For the Web Design Decal Group Project, we redesigned Reddit in a format inspired by Tumblr's clean interface and color contrasts.

  • HTML, CSS
  • April 2014
  • Web Design Decal
  • Web Design

Gary Forbes TypeOneTwo Brochure

I created an informational brochure for professional basketball player Gary Forbes' nonprofit, TypeOneTwo. TypeOneTwo is an online community that engages youth with living a healthy lifestyle.

  • Photoshop
  • April 2014
  • Gary Forbes
  • Graphic Design

An invite flyer to NFL Player Moise Fokou and Root 53 Foundation's dinner event featuring celebrity waiters.
